data.message: It's common to sell this in bottles in continental Europe but not so in the UK, why? Same goes for your brand, you see Pepsi in KFC and Wetherspoons and other bars but you don't seem to push your brand about in the UK as you do in Europe, Why?

replies.message: You see coke in McDonald's and Nando's and odeon, it'd pretty much 50/50

I give you McDonald's, more I'm confused why it's not on the bar scene. I have always been a fan of coke, but due to it not featuring in venues I go to often I have gotten use to Pepsi. One publican told me coke are not interested in that industry unless you have historic ties
David Graham most pubs In Scotland serve Coke not Pepsi....
